Recent Publications

  • Yulian Ding, Xiujuan Lei, Bo Liao, and Fang-Xiang Wu. Biomarker identification via a factorization machine-based neural network with binary pairwise encoding. Bioinformatics, 2019. [accepted]

  • Yulian Ding, Xiujuan Lei, Bo Liao, and Fang-Xiang Wu. MLRDFM: a multi-view Laplacian regularized DeepFM model for predicting miRNA-disease associations. Briefings in bioinformatics, 2021. [accepted]

  • Ding Y, Tian LP, Lei X, Liao B, Wu FX. Variational graph auto-encoders for miRNA-disease association prediction. Methods. 2021 Aug 1;192:25-34. [Link]

  • Ding Y, Lei X, Liao B, Wu F. Predicting miRNA-Disease Associations Based on Multi-View Variational Graph Auto-Encoder with Matrix Factorization. IEEE Journal of Biomedical and Health Informatics. 2021 Jun 10. [Link]

  • Ding Y, Lei X, Liao B, Wu FX. Machine learning approaches for predicting biomolecule-disease associations. Briefings in Functional Genomics. 2021 Feb 8. [Link]

  • Ding Y, Chen B, Lei X, Liao B, Wu FX. Predicting novel CircRNA-disease associations based on random walk and logistic regression model. Computational Biology and Chemistry. 2020 Aug 1;87:107287. [Link]

  • Ding Y, Wang F, Lei X, Liao B, Wu FX. Deep belief network–based matrix factorization model for MicroRNA-disease associations prediction. Evolutionary Bioinformatics. 2020 May;16:1176934320919707. [Link]
